name: Trans-Northern Pipelines Inc. - Application for Approval of Incentive Tolls Settlement Agreement
note: As part of my work as the lead market analyst on this file, I wrote the longest and most critical section of the decision. See section 5.2, Cost of marine and rail alternatives relative to TNPI's tolls (page numbers 26-52 or PDF pages 34 to 60). In addition to the decision, I drafted several rounds of information requests to Trans-Northern, Imperial Oil, and Suncor. During the two day public hearing in September 2023 I was responsible for analyzing final argument of the parties and drafting hearing questions asked by CER Commissioners to each parties legal counsel.
